meanings.definition: Capable of being placed in a tub for washing.
meanings.sent1: The small rubber duck is tubbable, so it can join you in the bath.
meanings.sent2: The plastic toy boats are tubbable and float on the water.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous cat thought it was tubbable and tried to take a bath.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a tubbable car that can drive on water seemed like a dream.
meanings.sent5: The soft sponge is the most tubbable item in the bathroom.

meanings.definition: Suitable for use in a tub.
meanings.sent1: The tubbable soap is gentle on the skin during a bath.
meanings.sent2: The waterproof book is tubbable and perfect for reading in the tub.
meanings.sent3: The tubbable rubber duck made bath time more fun for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The tubbable bath salts turned the water into a relaxing oasis.
meanings.sent5: The tubbable shampoo left her hair clean and shiny after the bath.

meanings.definition: Able to fit in a tub.
meanings.sent1: The small dog is tubbable and enjoys splashing around in the tub.
meanings.sent2: The tubbable baby bath seat keeps the infant safe while bathing.
meanings.sent3: The tubbable rubber ducky barely fit in the bathtub with all the toys.
meanings.sent4: The tubbable bath caddy holds all the essentials within reach.
meanings.sent5: The tubbable loofah helps scrub hard-to-reach areas in the bath.
